mapper.select: SELECT b.content, b.regdate, b.num_board, b.id_writer, l.count_like FROM ( SELECT b.content, b.regdate, b.num_board, b.id_writer FROM( SELECT id_follow FROM acorn_follow WHERE id_follower=#{id} ) a, acorn_board b WHERE a.id_follow=b.id_writer ) b, ( SELECT num_board, COUNT(num_board) AS count_like FROM acorn_like GROUP BY num_board ) l WHERE b.num_board = l.num_board(+) ORDER BY b.regdate
